name: Twelve Omar’s Odyssey
description:
Your journey will determine your path, Omar

As Jaden puts it, Omar is the reincarnation of his former best friend. A clone to a person closest to Jaden. The news sounds shocking to hear, but it pales from what Omar would have to endure. Eleven missions are assigned to prove if Omar is worthy to remain as the Twelve. Add to the fact that Omar will be uncovering the secret meaning behind the Jaden's dream journals. Omar must show his team members a reason to keep fighting beside them. 

Will Omar pass his trail as a Twelve member, or will he be taking a different route from the Twelve?
